name: XA Collider Gore-Tex Hiking Shoes - Women's

features: Reassuring protection: With reinforced toe panels, you’ll feel more stable and secure on uneven ground
Enhanced comfort: The generous fit, extra cushioning and soft fabrics mean this shoe is really comfy
